definition: to drink as the result of having lost a bet
to refuse a toast only to be forced to drink a forfeit/fig. to hesitate to do sth until forced to do even more
pinyin: jing4 jiu3 bu4 chi1 chi1 fa2 jiu3

sentences.english: The penalty for errors is drinking.
All mistakes are penalized by having to drink one glass.
sentences.chinese: 出錯的人將被罰酒一杯。
